main event: On July 8, 1966, a third mate observed a bright star-like object descending towards the ship in the Mediterranean Sea.
interesting points: The object increased in size until it appeared to be the size of a full moon,The object accelerated towards the ship, reaching within 25 feet,The object came to a sudden stop in mid-air before fading out completely, The observation lasted for several minutes,The sighting was recorded during the observer's sea watch.
witness description: Third Mate on the African Lagoon
